short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a precious piece of wisdom from your old granny

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides you with the opportunity to get valuable advice from your beloved old grandmother.

Two years ago I lost my grandmother to covid, it was really hard for me to deal with it, and even now it still hurts sometimes. I tried to do something small and fun that would remind me of my granny, and that's how this extension was created. Perhaps, someone can enjoy it too! ðŸ˜Š
